definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: The technology of line reinforced by the temporary beam in the D pattern and container bridge jacking has been widely applied.
sentences.chinese: 型便梁加固線路頂進箱橋施工技術已得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: We would suggest that you strengthen the cartons with double straps.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我方建議用兩根包裝帶加固紙板箱。

sentences.english: The basic principle of a detached type erasible and rewritable reinforced optic head is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了加固型可攝重寫分離式光學頭的基本工作原理。

sentences.english: It can be called as the exposition of surrounding rock reinforcement.
sentences.chinese: 此論述也可稱圍巖加固論。

sentences.english: The steel fiber concrete is used to strengthening the dam through more schemes comparison.
sentences.chinese: 經比選佛子嶺大壩加固採用鋼纖維混凝土新材料。

sentences.english: The embankment must be reinforced before the flood season.
sentences.chinese: 壩基一定要在洪汛期到來之前加固好。

sentences.english: The wooden cases used to pack the goods should be securely strapped.
sentences.chinese: 包裝貨物用的木箱要用包裝帶加固。

sentences.english: Analysis of Seepage and Measures of Seepage Control Strengthening for Right Abutment of Shitouhe Reservoir Dam.
sentences.chinese: 石頭河水庫大壩右壩肩滲漏分析及防滲加固措施。

sentences.english: Seepage prevention and reinforcement for unsafe reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 病險水庫除險加固工程。

sentences.english: So the reinforcing area is consist by natural foundation and reinforcement body.
sentences.chinese: 加固區是由天然地基和增強體兩部分組成的人工地基。

sentences.english: In this paper, the technique and calculation of beams strengthened by prestressing method are studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了用預應力法加固梁的工藝和計算。

sentences.english: We suggest that you reinforce the cartons with twice belts.
sentences.chinese: 我方建議用兩跟包裝帶加固紙箱。

sentences.english: The technique of high-pressure gunite is applied to the foundation anti-seepage and reinforcement engineering and outstanding achievements were acquired.
sentences.chinese: 高壓噴射灌漿進行地基防滲加固，取得了顯著的成就。

sentences.english: We have applyed it in submicron radiation-hard circuit successfully.
sentences.chinese: 並在亞微米的抗輻射加固電路中成功應用。

sentences.english: Due to the function alteration of Suzhou Wuxian commercial building, structural strengthening is carried out.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州吳縣商業大樓因使用功能改變引起改造加固。

sentences.english: The special features and applications of warp-knitted biaxial and multiaxial reinforcement sturctures are described .
sentences.chinese: 描述了雙軸向和多軸向加固經編織物特點和應用。

definition: to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
